 2017-13662017-11-09PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of BALPREET SINGH BOPARAI of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis, effective December 11, 2017.
